page.title: 13Small Business:Knightbridge.
page.content: Mr Devereux is an Insurance Broker. He has been a businessman who has handled various retail businesses. The Knightsbridge Business Centre is his latest venture. On an area of land at Knightsbridge he has developed a site for 30 small businesses. At the moment there are 23 operating from the Centre. They include a Sausage Factory, a carpentry firm, engineering and various other small businesses. He saw a need for such a facility for small firms and he gets assistance from the Gloucestershire Enterprise Agency.He also offers a centralised secretarial service for photocopying,typing and telephones.(This is available to other firms besides the Knightsbridge Business)The site opened in 1982.It is well publicised and the interest seems good.He has plans for another 11 units
